column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This was an AMAZING dining experience. Recently moving to Chicago
column2: this is definitely my new go-to tapas and drinks spot. Absolutely love the atmosphere
column3: very upbeat and the service is friendly and attentive. Was here with friends
column5: not one we didn't love. Also had a house margarita and couple pitchers of different sangrias. Thank you for an amazing night!
